extendedIngredients.name: celery ribs

title: Citrus, Celery, and Shaved Fennel Salad
summary: Citrus, Celery, and Shaved Fennel Salad is a gluten free and vegan side dish. This recipe makes 6 servings with 175 calories, 2g of protein, and 9g of fat each. For 95 cents per serving, this recipe covers 11% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. Head to the store and pick up pepper, olive oil, navel oranges, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 25 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 69%. This score is good. Try Shaved Apple, Fennel and Celery Salad | Finding Balance, Lobster Salad Rolls with Shaved Fennel and Citrus, and Shaved Celery, Celery Root, and Radish Salad for similar recipes.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Whisk together vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Add oil in a slow stream, whisking, until combined.                                                                Cut peel, including all white pith, from oranges and grapefruit with a paring knife. Working over a bowl, cut segments free from membranes. Squeeze juice from membranes into a small bowl, then whisk 3 tablespoons juice into vinaigrette. Drain citrus segments, then add to vinaigrette.                                                                Quarter fennel bulbs lengthwise, then cut lengthwise into paper-thin slices (about 1/16 inch thick) with slicer. Add to fruit along with celery and toss gently to combine.                                                                            * Available at Asian markets, many cookware shops, and Uwajimaya (800-889-1928).

steps.step: Whisk together vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.
Add oil in a slow stream, whisking, until combined.

Cut peel, including all white pith, from oranges and grapefruit with a paring knife. Working over a bowl, cut segments free from membranes. Squeeze juice from membranes into a small bowl, then whisk 3 tablespoons juice into vinaigrette.
Drain citrus segments, then add to vinaigrette.
Quarter fennel bulbs lengthwise, then cut lengthwise into paper-thin slices (about 1/16 inch thick) with slicer.
Add to fruit along with celery and toss gently to combine.
* Available at Asian markets, many cookware shops, and Uwajimaya (800-889-1928).
